title: Fix .NET 9 ASP.NET Blazor issues
body:
**Description of Change**

The `IJSUnmarshalledObjectReference` type has been removed (and we may have only ever needed `IJSInProcessObjectReference`) but we want to use the new `[JSImport]` attributes.

There are several changes:

* For .NET 7+ we use the new `[JSImport]` attributes
* The new `[JSImport]` attribute does not yet support the `ElementReference` type, so we have to use the element ID `_bl_#` (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/78455)
* Added a workaround for a linking order or some other issue (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/109289)
* The `Module` object is no longer available, so we copy the work we did for GL and add Module and GL to `SkiaSharpInterop`
* Fixed the ordering of the wasm features: `simd,st` to the correct `st,simd`
* Update Xcode since 14 is gone
* Using the correct get/set methods instead of the (incorrect) indexer which makes the delete work


**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/2991
- Fixes https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/3065

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

**API Changes**

None.

<!-- REPLACE THIS COMMENT

Changed:

 - `object Cell.OldPropertyName => object Cell.NewPropertyName`

-->

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

<!-- Describe any non-bug related behavioral changes that may change how users app behaves when upgrading to this version of the codebase. -->

**Required skia PR**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
